overview: From 2026-01-16 to 2026-01-17, elizaos/eliza had 0 new PRs (1 merged), 3 new issues, and 8 active contributors.

topIssues.title: Logging in or signing up should take you back to agent chat where you left off
topIssues.author: borisudovicic
topIssues.body:
Right now it takes you to dashboard.

[Screen Recording 2026-01-09 at 14.15.18.mov](https://uploads.linear.app/186bdefa-3633-464a-80cd-6e86fe765a5c/4f0c2ba4-fab5-4942-b626-f4d2642f7a9b/e06b3046-253e-438a-95e0-34d1e54b2b37?signature=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJwYXRoIjoiLzE4NmJkZWZhLTM2MzMtNDY0YS04MGNkLTZlODZmZTc2NWE1Yy80ZjBjMmJhNC1mYWI1LTQ5NDItYjYyNi1mNGQyNjQyZjdhOWIvZTA2YjMwNDYtMjUzZS00MzhhLTk1ZTAtMzRkMWU1NGIyYjM3IiwiaWF0IjoxNzY3OTg2MTM0LCJleHAiOjE3OTk1NTY2OTR9.S6h7PYr4pqq-CxQ2Og0NnFFIZKBv6rtsm1-jKyqtAjM)

topIssues.title: Remove the + from personality traits and topics of interest fields
topIssues.author: borisudovicic
topIssues.body: This is bad UX that we carried over from the Eliza GUI. These should just be fields like bio and system prompt. The bottom two, conversation examples and post examples probably can be okay with the + since it would be difficult to do it otherwise.

topIssues.title: [Migration] Eligibility Mismatch & Snapshot Bug - Tangem Hardware Wallet
topIssues.author: Zenobow
topIssues.body:
Description: I am reporting a discrepancy in my $ai16z migration eligibility. My current $ai16z holdings are consolidated in my Tangem hardware wallet. During the official snapshot on Nov 11, 2025 (11:40 UTC), this wallet held the bulk of my tokens.

The Problem: When I connect to the migration portal (migrate.elizafoundation.ai), the system only recognizes a small fraction (710 tokens) which were held in a separate Solflare hot-wallet at the time. My Tangem wallet's snapshot balance is not being correctly identified or synced by the portal.

Verified On-Chain Evidence (Tangem Wallet):

Holding Address: 2SELmng3aKdrPKad41PEZA5XAt5Hex8TCpKrwY8AX8K8

Snapshot Balance (Nov 11): 70,000 $ai16z

Supporting Transaction Hashes:

4gPGjNc31yPwJrSomHEgwGAWQyJcPmgYUKw8iu4NaMTQhTgEjvdd1TdwyEphg2qfhHvqmony5kHzJFhQa6syDNWb [43,000 ai16z]

363QaEUbGTnDVK9Uvm9xqnDaphpdSY5YaQjgdC9xi3AcbNZJpW7H7gbEvaCLL5fcSoD1PeGqwddfgXbo6pC5Jfav [17,000 ai16z]

5KDLm7qA71yrGfUW6SxzVTWY4KxBeYxuAPiWZWTAG4Y6xMex1JbjfzAYuDWTR86oKTXMcy2WDLAdnSgagKbR9x6q [8,000 ai16z]

36UzzHTLVVN6xsi96YWZqCApkUfA8Z9T5AuXRuBi8ti1nvpQ6aS2tgcBYbRz497dAzAkdanefBZSGYm2Qyp9TSEi [2,000 ai16z]

Request: Please manually verify the snapshot data for address 2SELmng3aKdrPKad41PEZA5XAt5Hex8TCpKrwY8AX8K8 and whitelist the full eligible amount for the 1:6 $ELIZAOS swap. As Tangem does not support seed phrase export and has connection issues with the portal, I need this backend update to proceed before the February 4th deadline.

Thank you for your help!

topIssues.title: Future: able to deploy smart contracts
topIssues.author: metatev
topIssues.body: Want to add feature that can deploy smart contract to on-chain

topPRs.title: refactor(plugin-sql): extract domain stores from BaseDrizzleAdapter
topPRs.author: standujar
topPRs.body:
Refactors `BaseDrizzleAdapter` (~3,900 lines) into composable domain stores. This improves maintainability, testability, and separation of concerns without changing the public API. ## Changes ### New Domain Stores (`src/stores/`) | Store | Responsibility | Methods | |-------|----------------|---------| | `AgentStore` | Agent CRUD operations | get, getAll, create, update, delete, count | | `MemoryStore` | Memory & embeddings | get, getById, getByIds, create, update, delete, search, count | | `RoomStore` | Room management | getByIds, getByWorld, create, update, delete | | `ParticipantStore` | Room participants | getRoomsForEntity, add, remove, getForRoom, isParticipant, userState | | `EntityStore` | Entity management | getByIds, getForRoom, create, update, delete, getByNames, searchByName | | `ComponentStore` | ECS components | get, getAll, create, update, delete | | `RelationshipStore` | Entity relationships | create, update, get, getAll | | `CacheStore` | Key-value cache | get, set, delete | | `WorldStore` | World management | create, get, getAll, update, delete | | `TaskStore` | Task management | create, getByParams, getByName, get, update, delete | | `LogStore` | Logging & summaries | create, getMany, getAgentRunSummaries, delete | | `MessagingStore` | Servers, channels, messages | createServer, getServers, createChannel, getChannels, createMessage, getMessages, participants | ### Architecture ``` BaseDrizzleAdapter │ ├── initStores() ───────────────────────────────┐ │ │ │ ┌─────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ │ │ StoreContext │◄─┘ │ │ • getDb() │ │ │ • withRetry() │ │ │ • withIsolationContext() │ │ │ • agentId │ │ │ • getEmbeddingDimension() │ │ └─────────────────────────────────────────┘ │ │ │ ┌─────────┴─────────┐ │ ▼ ▼ │ ┌──────────┐ ┌──────────┐ │ │ Store1 │ ... │ StoreN │ │ └──────────┘ └──────────┘ │ └── Public methods delegate to stores ``` ### Key Design Decisions 1. **Shared Context**: All stores receive a `StoreContext` with database access, retry logic, and RLS isolation 2. **No API Changes**: All public methods remain identical - only internal implementation refactored ## Impact - **Lines reduced**: `base.ts` from ~3,900 to ~1,350 lines (~65% reduction) - **Files added**: 13 new files in `src/stores/` - **Public API**: No changes - **Tests**: All 160 unit + all integration tests pass (PGLite + PostgreSQL) ## Testing ```bash # Unit tests bun run test:unit # 160 pass # Integration tests (PGLite) bun run test:integration # All pass # Integration tests (PostgreSQL) bun run test:integration:postgres # All pass (including RLS tests) ``` ## Migration No migration needed - this is a pure refactoring with no public API changes.

Greptile Summary

- Refactors monolithic `BaseDrizzleAdapter` class (~3,900 lines) into 11 focused domain stores in `packages/plugin-sql/src/stores/` to improve maintainability and testability while preserving the exact same public API - Introduces `StoreContext` pattern that provides shared database access, retry logic, and Row Level Security isolation to all domain stores, maintaining consistency across the codebase - Implements comprehensive CRUD operations across stores for agents, memories, rooms, participants, entities, components, relationships, caching, worlds, tasks, and logging

Important Files Changed

| Filename | Overview | |----------|----------| | packages/plugin-sql/src/base.ts | Refactored from ~3,900 to ~1,350 lines by extracting domain logic into stores and adding delegation methods | | packages/plugin-sql/src/stores/memory.store.ts | New store handling memory CRUD, vector embeddings, and similarity search operations | | packages/plugin-sql/src/stores/entity.store.ts | New store for entity management including component aggregation and name-based searching | | packages/plugin-sql/src/stores/log.store.ts | New store with complex agent run summaries and JSON sanitization for logging operations |

Confidence score: 4/5

- This is a well-executed refactoring with comprehensive testing and minimal risk due to preserved public API - Score lowered due to minor issues: unused parameter in TaskStore.getAll(), missing agent ID filter in TaskStore.delete(), and complex field mapping logic in RelationshipStore that could be simplified - No files require special attention - the refactoring successfully maintains API compatibility while improving code organization

Sequence Diagram

```mermaid sequenceDiagram participant Client as "Client" participant Adapter as "BaseDrizzleAdapter" participant StoreContext as "StoreContext" participant MemoryStore as "MemoryStore" participant Manager as "ConnectionManager" participant DB as "Database" Note over Client,DB: Memory Search Flow (Primary Happy Path) Client->>Adapter: searchMemoriesByEmbedding(embedding, params) Adapter->>Adapter: withDatabase(() => operation()) Adapter->>MemoryStore: searchByEmbedding(embedding, params) MemoryStore->>StoreContext: withRetry(() => operation()) StoreContext->>MemoryStore: Execute operation MemoryStore->>StoreContext: getDb() StoreContext->>MemoryStore: Return database instance MemoryStore->>DB: Execute cosine distance query with conditions DB-->>MemoryStore: Return matching memories with similarity scores MemoryStore->>MemoryStore: Transform results to Memory objects MemoryStore-->>StoreContext: Return transformed memories StoreContext-->>Adapter: Return memories Adapter-->>Client: Return Memory[] Note over Client,DB: Memory Creation Flow Client->>Adapter: createMemory(memory, tableName) Adapter->>Adapter: withDatabase(() => operation()) Adapter->>MemoryStore: create(memory, tableName) MemoryStore->>StoreContext: withIsolationContext(entityId, callback) StoreContext->>Manager: withIsolationContext(entityId, callback) Manager->>DB: Set RLS context for entity Manager->>MemoryStore: Execute callback with transaction MemoryStore->>DB: Insert memory record MemoryStore->>MemoryStore: upsertEmbedding(tx, memoryId, embedding) MemoryStore->>DB: Insert/Update embedding record DB-->>MemoryStore: Return inserted memory ID MemoryStore-->>StoreContext: Return memory ID StoreContext-->>Adapter: Return memory ID Adapter-->>Client: Return UUID Note over Client,DB: Agent Operations Flow Client->>Adapter: getAgent(agentId) Adapter->>Adapter: withDatabase(() => operation()) Adapter->>AgentStore: get(agentId) AgentStore->>StoreContext: withRetry(() => operation()) AgentStore->>StoreContext: getDb() StoreContext->>AgentStore: Return database instance AgentStore->>DB: SELECT from agents WHERE id = agentId DB-->>AgentStore: Return agent record AgentStore->>AgentStore: Transform to Agent object AgentStore-->>Adapter: Return Agent Adapter-->>Client: Return Agent ```

Context used (3)

 - Context from `dashboard` - CLAUDE.md ([source](https://app.greptile.com/review/custom-context?memory=8ef4c9a3-e221-4aef-8556-8c9b88bf6bbb)) - Context from `dashboard` - .cursorrules ([source](https://app.greptile.com/review/custom-context?memory=00074882-001f-44b1-89c4-859ed3656db9)) - Context from `dashboard` - AGENTS.md ([source](https://app.greptile.com/review/custom-context?memory=51febe90-8918-4f18-be1f-d43bb68d696c))
